location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J Stewart, Deputy Assistant to the Commissariat Department at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from J Stewart, Deputy Assistant to the Commissariat Department at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, informing that he was in charge to provide horses for the remount of the Madras Cavalry and asking about horses' availability and price in Bushire and Persia.
